pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Probit Models // A collection of methods for the Bayesian estimation of Spatial Probit, Spatial Ordered Probit and Spatial Tobit Models. Original implementations from the works of 'LeSage and Pace' (2009, ISBN: 1420064258) were ported and adjusted for R, as described in 'Wilhelm and de Matos' (2013) doi:10.32614/RJ-2013-013.
